meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in dealing with a particular type of opponent or situation
meanings.sent1: As a matador in negotiations, she always knew the right move to make.
meanings.sent2: He proved to be a matador in the business world, always coming out on top.
meanings.sent3: The matador of video games finally defeated the unbeatable boss.
